channel.title: Vestibule :: Suggestions for "No one plans for complexity, and neither should you!"
channel.description: A list of all suggestions made for "No one plans for complexity, and neither should you!"

item.title: Suggestion from the proposer
item.description: Done and done, I saw that after the first time I submitted it I got a Rails 500 errors, so I hit 'back' and submitted it again only to see I had done it twice :/

item.title: Suggestion from Nikos Dimitrakopoulos (@)
item.description: Hey, can you withdraw one of the two? You seem to have submitted it twice :) (http://cfp.euruko2013.org/proposals/96)
